attributes.action: Reduce the price of vehicle tax on leisure vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition about the price of vehicle tax on leisure vehicle:eg MOTORHOMES because us owner do not use the vehicles all day  or every day like cars or 4x4 towing caravans.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
